Issue.creator: vladimirwork
Issue.summary: Improve load script for correct statistic about payment requests
Issue.description: There are empty 'label' and 'client_sent' fields for get requests in load script (1.0.21 version) output and field 'id' contains something like payment address so it looks like some reading payment requests don't fill these fields. This should be investigated and fixed since it causes to errors in throughput\latency calculations.
